metadata.synopsis: Sequential, repeated AD for Chop, the Colony butcher. He will say a line every few seconds while in his idle behaviour. Chop is generally enjoying his job, but something deep beneath his enthralled exterior realizes the horror of his reality. Some of these lines could be considered a little bit song-like - Chop would be humming to himself while working.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use command "oe COL_Butcher" or go to the Colony Morgue with the debugbook- Observe Chop, the Colony butcher, repeating this sequential AD every now and then

0.speaker: Chop
0.text: Pretty faces go chop... faces? No - no faces, only meat. Never think, never stop. Only chop. Chop. CHOP.
0.context: NodeContext: Brief note of lucidity on '...faces?' as he seems momentarily aware of his condition - then shakes it off and returns to his work rhythm a little more forcefully.

1.speaker: Chop
1.text: Steel loves meat. It sings chop, chop, chop.
1.context: NodeContext: Speaking to himself while working. Guttural sing-sing quality

2.speaker: Chop
2.text: Pretty red. Pretty pink. Make more. Never think. Always chop, chop, chop.
